ygData.subject: Re: Spell Resisted
ygData.msgSnippet: ... ur lvl ... shock ... XP and ... When ... cleric says ... lvl. ... except to ... If your conscience lets you do this, go for it.  Mine won t. -Pennaggolan
ygData.messageBody:
At 11:57 AM 06/25/1999 -0400, you wrote:
>From: yur@...
>
>I don't know about you, but i have NEVER been kicked out of a group for being
>resisted. mainly because i don't tell them i'm resisted :). Just cast
ur lvl
>1 shock and since its only 6 dmg. the mob will NEVER (at least never for me)
>come after you. and your group can't tell the difference in the color of the
>spells since all of them look the same. they think ur casing some high lvl
shock
>heehhe.
>
>Works fine for me so far, i sit there, no danger, no mana loss, and i get
XP and
>follow their loot order just fine. I made 50 plat and gained 2 lvl in 3 days
>and died only once. From the skeleton monk i mention in previous post.
When
>group leader ask for mana status, just say what others say. (ie. if
cleric says
>20% mana, u say 15%) that way they don't think ur doing nothing hehe.
>
>its good trick and works well to keep our mind off how they block up at 6
lvl.
>Since verant make us team up, i don't see much else we can do about it
except to
>abuse the fact that others cannot see what we cast and what our mana is at
:) [
>maybe this is why they don't let others see?]


If your conscience lets you do this, go for it. Mine won't.

-Pennaggolan
